title: Civil War and reconstruction: 1861-1877
creator_credit: Alvin Yudkoff, Milton Meltzer and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: Shows the election of Abraham Lincoln, the establishment of the Confederacy, Civil War, and the problems of reconstruction. Includes the role of African Americans in the Civil War after the emancipation proclamation and the terror in the South following the war. Also includes education of African Americans and activities of the Ku Klux Klan.
